name: Berok Skoff
content:
Berok Skoff was Mos Espa's combat guild hall major and Human male who lived during the Galactic Civil War.
He was a leading member in the Mos Espa Militia and a key figure in the Battle of Mos Espa. He would wear Mark III Crusader armor.
Berok Skoff was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Berok Skoff was added to the game as part of the "Tusken Army" Heroic Encounter, introduced with the release of the "Chapter 7" update, on November 1, 2007.
